00017 template<bool COND, class T, class F>
00018 struct if_then_else { typedef void value; };
00019 
00020 template<class T, class F>
00021 struct if_then_else<true, T, F> { typedef T value; };

00024 struct if_then_else<false, T, F> { typedef F value; };

00031 struct if_then_else_int { static const int value = -1; };
00032 
00033 template<int T, int F>
00034 struct if_then_else_int<true, T, F> { static const int value = T; };
00035

00037 struct if_then_else_int<false, T, F> { static const int value = F; };
